refnamediv.refpurpose: An interface for serial audio feed services like Podiobooks.com.

listitem.para: Allows the user of a serial audio feed service to manage its subscriptions. Select from update, format, subscribe, release, browse to begin a task. Each task may also ask for additional information before performance. Each task will loop over itself till you enter a blank line.

Provides the user of a serial audio feed service acess on thier desktop. The interface displays available the user's serial audio feed subscriptions on a service and displays a formated feed for each when chosen. The interface allows the update serial audio feed subscriptions from a service. The interface also allows the user to listen or download available serial audio episodes from a selected feed.Write serial audio feed data subscribed as a formated page.
